args.name: AI Ethics Consultant
args.jd: Provide guidance on ethical implications of AI technologies and develop frameworks for responsible AI deployment.
jr: PhD in Philosophy, Ethics, or related field
5+ years of experience in AI ethics or policy
Strong understanding of machine learning technologies and their societal impacts
Excellent communication and stakeholder engagement skills
args.company: Accenture, a global professional services company specializing in IT services and consulting.

args.name: Machine Learning Engineer
args.jd: Design and implement machine learning models to improve product features and user engagement.
jr: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
2+ years of experience in machine learning and software development
Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn
Experience with cloud services like AWS or Azure
args.company: Google, a multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products.

args.name: AI Product Manager
args.jd: Lead the development and launch of AI-driven products, collaborating with engineering and design teams.
jr: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field
4+ years of experience in product management, preferably in AI or tech
args.company: Microsoft, a leading global technology company known for its software products and services.

args.name: AI Research Scientist
args.jd: Conduct cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence and publish findings in scientific journals.
jr: PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related field
3+ years of research experience in AI or machine learning
Expertise in neural networks and natural language processing
Strong programming skills in Python and C++
args.company: OpenAI, an AI research organization focused on ensuring that artificial general intelligence benefits all of humanity.
